name: Online Performing Arts Programs
description: Online programming that includes mental, physical & vocal exercises…and puppets, movement and creativity with improv and theater, opportunity to tell your story with hip-hop, spoken word & writing, dance and choreography, clowning and playwriting. Lots of workshops!
fullDescription: Online programming that includes mental, physical & vocal exercises…and puppets, movement and creativity with improv and theater, opportunity to tell your story with hip-hop, spoken word & writing, dance and choreography, clowning and playwriting. Lots of workshops!
whatTheyOffer: Online programming that includes mental, physical & vocal exercises…and puppets, movement and creativity with improv and theater, opportunity to tell your story with hip-hop, spoken word & writing, dance and choreography, clowning and playwriting. Lots of workshops!
howToGetIt: Call or send email to info@handfulplayers.org
